channel.title: Stupid Question On Isle 3
channel.description:
I'm using Pvpscape and this is probably a freakishly stupid question to all you expert coders and such, but when I use the runserver batch file it says starting on 0.0.0.0:43594, how do I change the IP I want it to start the server on?
Thanks in advance, Sha Owned
